item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am a senior at Yale majoring in Ecology and Evolutionary Biology. I can still say this because I will graduate in two weeks, and it will feel a bit strange to not introduce myself as a student. I am broadly interested in evolutionary biology and outdoors life (snowboarding/skiing, hiking, trail running, figure skating, badminton). I plan to attend Ecole Polytechnique de Lausanne starting September 2021. You can contact me at gladysfangcs@gmail.

item.title: Yale Reflections #1 - Courses
item.description: I have two finals left, yet I decide to write about my Yale experience. After all, what better procrastinations are there other than “reflections”? TEST 2
